songs.title: Jamba
Kotrobaratra
Losogno anao
songs.content:
{title: Losogno anao}
{artist: John Betoto}
{lyricist: GasyTab}
{start_of_verse}
L[A]osogno an[F#m]ao, 
Nand[D]eha tsy nimp[E]ody e 
Zaho r[A]aika foagna at[F#m]o ie 
Tsy taf[D]andry e isan'[E]aligna e 
Mahatsi[A]aro ny foto[F#m]agna a 
Niar[D]ahagna tat[E]o e 
Kao n[A]isy noti[F#m]aviko e 
D[D]onko [E]an[A]a [E] 
{end_of_verse}
{start_of_chorus}
Ny [A]elanelan-t[F#m]any 
Aza at[D]ao mahak[E]etraka e 
Amin[A]ao lalan-d[F#m]ava 
Ny [D]eritreritry [E]e 
Aza ad[A]igno fa at[F#m]o e 
Misy [D]olo tian[E]ao o o 
F[A]arahafahar[F#m]atsiny e, 
Tarat[D]asy [E]alef[A]aso o 
{end_of_chorus}
{start_of_verse}
Fagnenjehagna atao atsika aro 
Tsy ahoako o 
Malaigna ny malaigna e 
Tsy mampagnino o 
Ny losogno zahavo 
Niarahantsika roa igny e 
Kao nisy tsy foiky e Donko ana 
{end_of_verse}

songs.title: Mbola ho avy
Mbola tiako ianao
Sipa voadona
Tambatra Kaiamba
songs.content:
{title: Tambatra Kaiamba}
{artist: Kaiamba tena izy}
{lyricist: GasyTab}
{start_of_verse}
Dimy mianaka hono izy ireo 
Efa nihezaka hatramin’ny ela 
Nikaroka momba ny hasambarana 
Amin’ity fiainana ity 
Iza re iza iza no hafaka 
hanambara o fa olona sambatra 
Iza re iza iza no hafaka 
hanambara hoy aho fa olona sambatra 
{end_of_verse}
{start_of_verse}
Anaram-biavy, i Volazara 
Viavy tsara tsy mety very anjara 
Tetezan’ambo rano ka be 
Tsy azoko niany 
Alaiko amaraigna Kalalao matin-dronono (azalahy) 
Mafy matin-draha tiana tsiahy 
Tsy valivaly ny nosinambo 
Leka tsy maty mbola hitrotro o! 
{end_of_verse}
{start_of_verse}
Efa ela be izay no tsy nahitako an'azy 
Malahelo anie aho Manimanina e 
Nefa atao ahoana moa mbbola ho avy ny andro iray 
Na ho éla  na ho haingana 
Tsy maintsy mbola hihaona 
{end_of_verse}
{start_of_verse}
Fa lasan’olon-kafa any ny malala o! 
Tsy nametra-beloma itsony fa, nalaina nivolagna 
Aza kivy mantsy e! mahereza aro 
Aza kivy matse, mahereza foana 
Mbola miaina eto an-tany tsy ho lany tandrifiny 
{end_of_verse}
{start_of_verse}
Ela moa no tsy nahita anao e 
Ka manantena sady miandry aky 
Ela no te-ho eo anilanao e 
Satria mbola ho avy ny anjarantsika roa 
{end_of_verse}
{start_of_verse}
Nahoana kosa akia no dia andosiranao 
ilay foko mbola tia e 
Heverinao angaha fa fahadisoana ho ahy 
ny nandao anao ety 
Fa noho ilay fianaranao 
fa ndrao voahelingelina 
ka zary hampanenina 
Asa kosa re izay mba eritreritrao 
Fa ilay foko izao mandre ilay fery vaovao, 
 malahelo Malahelo, Malahelo aho ho'aho 
 
 Hitanao fa na dia mahizign' andro 
 na kotro-baratra arahina oran'andro 
 Tsy ataoko sakana tsy andeha ato e! 
 efa tsy tantin'ny foko 
 fa aminao fogna ny eritreritro (2x) 
 
 Ny elanelan-tany 
 Aza atao mahaketraka e 
 Aminao lalan-dava 
 Ny eritreritry e 
 Aza adigno fa ato e 
 Misy olo tianao o o 
 Farahafaharatsiny e, 
 Taratasy alefaso o {end_of_verse}

songs.title: Tsy anjara
Volazara
Anjarantsika roa
